code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"./CorrectionLibre.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function CorrectionLibre(){const[files,setFiles]=useState([]);const[bareme,setBareme]=useState("");const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleFiles=e=>{setFiles([...e.target.files]);};const lancerCorrection=async()=>{if(files.length===0)return alert("Ajoute au moins une photo ou un PDF");const formData=new FormData();files.forEach(f=>formData.append("copies",f));formData.append("bareme",bareme);setLoading(true);try{const res=await axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:5000/correction/libre",formData);setResult(res.data);}catch(e){alert("Erreur lors de la correction");}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Correction libre"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"\uD83D\uDCF7 Photos / PDF (recto-verso possible)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",multiple:true,accept:"image/*,.pdf",onChange:handleFiles}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"\uD83D\uDCD1 Bar\xE8me (optionnel)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Ex: Q1=5pts, Q2=10pts...",value:bareme,onChange:e=>setBareme(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:lancerCorrection,disabled:loading,children:loading?"Correction en cours...":"Lancer la correction"})]}),result&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"result",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"R\xE9sultat"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83D\uDCCA Note : ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[result.note,"/20"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83E\uDDE0 Appr\xE9ciation : ",result.appreciation]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83D\uDCC1 Fichiers analys\xE9s : ",result.fichiers_analyses]})]})]});}
